item.title: Initial commit to blogging. Asking Right Questions
item.description:
Mood: I’m proud about myself, excited about future. I have things to share! Stay in touch.
Asking the right questions takes as much skill as giving the right answers. – Robert Half
item.content:
Mood: I’m proud about myself, excited about future.

I have things to share! Stay in touch.



Asking the right questions takes as much skill as giving the right answers.

– Robert Half
